value.content: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:v1="http://group.vodafone.com/schema/vbm/service/customer-service-inventory-item/v1" xmlns:v11="http://group.vodafone.com/schema/common/v1"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <v1:GetCustomerServiceInventoryItemListVBMRequest> <v11:Criteria> <v11:QueryExpression> <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 2 items at this level--> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <v11:QueryExpression> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <v11:ValueExpression Path="/CustomerServiceInventoryItemVBO/RelatedCustomerServiceInventoryItems/RelatedCustomerServiceInventoryItem/IDs/ID[@schemeName='MSISDN']"> <!--Zero or more repetitions:--> <v11:Value>34
